data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhang, Rui, Li, Qiang, Niu, Ze-Qing, Zhu, Chao-Dong (2011): A newly recorded Subgenus Sudila from China with description of two new species (Hymenoptera: Halictidae: Lasioglossum). Zootaxa 2937: 31-36, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.203940
